sys_openapi_operation.name: Get issue
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get issue","fOperationId":"getIssue","fDescription":"Returns a single issue, for a given issue ID or issue key. Issues returned from this resource include Agile fields, like sprint, closedSprints, flagged, and epic. ","fPath":"/agile/1.0/issue/{issueIdOrKey}","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returns the requested issue.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json"}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Returned if the request is invalid.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the user is not logged in.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user does not a have valid license.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned in these cases:
  • the issue does not exist
  • the user does not have permission to view issue
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"issueIdOrKey","fDescription":"The ID or key of the requested issue.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"issueIdOrKey3802686662","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"fields","fDescription":"The list of fields to return for each issue. By default, all navigable and Agile fields are returned.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"fields6573254000","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"fields6573254000","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},{"fName":"expand","fDescription":"A comma-separated list of the parameters to expand.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"expand3177109116","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"updateHistory","fDescription":"A boolean indicating whether the issue retrieved by this method should be added to the current user's issue history","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"updateHistory1827484461","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]}]}
